recipe.title: Quick Kale Soup
recipe.ingredient: 3 bacon rashers diced (leave out if you want to have it vegetarian)
recipe.step: Heat oil in pot and cook garlic, bacon, thyme, bay leaves, carrot and celery for 10 minutes on medium-low heat. Once done add water and stock cubes, bring to the boil and reduce to a simmer and cook for 10 minutes. Add lentils and cook for 5-7 minuets. Remove bay leaves and thyme stems then add kale and stir well. Serve hot with bread of your choice if desired.
